message: Any one help me understand this, Please !!!!!!!!!!!
name: Anonymous Recursion in C# - Yet Another Language Geek - Site Home - MSDN Blogs
caption: blogs.msdn.com
description: Recursionis beautiful andlambdasare the ultimate abstraction.  But how can they be used together?  Lambdas are anonymous functions and recursion requires names.  Let's try to define a lambda that computes the nth fibonacci number.

data.message: This is a little bit simpler explanation, using Javascript http://amix.dk/blog/post/19239
It's called the y-combinator, which is a nice brain exercise, but I didn't find a case where I actually needed it. Plus, I prefer to use simple solutions instead of complex ones
